name: canva_bulk_search
description: Search multiple template types on Canva in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling canva_search_templates multiple times - it is faster and more efficient. Pass all queries as a single comma-separated string.

detailSteps.code: const results = []; const seen = new Set(); const links = document.querySelectorAll('a[href*="/templates/"]'); for (let i = 0; i < links.length && results.length < 5; i++) { const el = links[i]; const href = el.href || ''; if (!href || seen.has(href)) continue; seen.add(href); const ariaLabel = el.getAttribute('aria-label') || ''; const nameEl = el.querySelector('h3, h4, [aria-label]'); const imgEl = el.querySelector('img'); const proEl = el.querySelector('[aria-label*="Pro"], [aria-label*="premium"]'); const title = ariaLabel || (nameEl ? (nameEl.getAttribute('aria-label') || nameEl.textContent.trim()) : ''); results.push({ title: title, is_premium: !!proEl, image: imgEl ? imgEl.getAttribute('src') : '', url: href }); } const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { query: params.get('q') || '', result_count: results.length, results: results }
detailSteps.name: search_results
detailSteps.label: Extract results
